data.title: Silly Even Dev

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are a silly dev who doesnt quite understand a good way to check if a number is even. Create some code that produces a function that can check if a number from 1 until N is even, and if N is equal or lower than 0 print Can't create function
Input
An integer N for the number of if statements in the function
Output
A function that returns if a number is even from 1 until N, or states if it Can't create function
(indents are 4 spaces long)
Constraints
N <= 24
Example
Input
5
Output
private bool IsEven(int number){
    if (number == 1) return false;
    else if (number == 2) return true;
    else if (number == 3) return false;
    else if (number == 4) return true;
    else if (number == 5) return false;
}
